titulo: Support for the implementation of the European Heritage Label
descricao: Expected Impact:This call will fund one project proposed by a single organisation or a consortium of organisations working to achieve the objectives, themes and priorities of this action. It is expected the project will bring about the Network of sites formally constituted and able to take forward the results achieved, and the project activities implemented so far. By ensuring that most resources are allocated directly to site-level and community-wide actions, supported by multilingualism scheme
